name: DLay The Inevitable
description:
DELAY THE INEVITABLE!

Story

You are the Shaman of the Island Kalani.

DLAY, The Inevitable, is almost waking up from his sleep. His hunger has no match, no matter how much you feed it. The time to face him and release the island from this curse is near. 

Grab and throw sacrifices at him to defeat him and avoid his attacks.

Gameplay

An arcade game. You must sacrifice sheep to make DLAY weak, so it will be easier in the final showdown. 

You grab sheeps (when they have the grabbing icon above) and throw them to the pit, sheeps will take life away from DLAY but golden ones will help you recover your health, since you can only be hit by DLAY 5 times.

The game ends by you defeating DLAY or him destroying the island.

Controls

Gamepad and Keyboad Supported

  • Move: WASD / Arrows / DPAD / Left Stick
  • Grab and Throw: SPACEBAR / Face Buttons (A,B,X,Y, Triangle, Square, X, O)

Core loop

  1. Dream Starts (Timer Starts).
  2. Pick the sheep.
  3. Sacrifice the sheep.
  4. Fight against DLAY.
